channel.title: Chane bonuses?
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to change the bonus of a item for a special person? Example : if owner wears dragon claw, the bonus of the d'claw will be 5 times greater than the bonus if a player wears it.
So the slash bonus of a d'claw for a normal player is 50, then owner would have it as 250.
Btw I want this to be working on [PI]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Chane bonuses?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

DestroyerOfRsps:

That’s what I wanted tysm I’ll just do that to a random ring.

You’re welcome I suppose…

Read full topic

item.title: Chane bonuses?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“DestroyerOfRsps, post:3, topic:426771”]You know how we can have different whip, like dragon rune and other whips.

So what if I can make a different Id for item like d’claws and change the bonus of it + make the rights as >=3.

But the problem is, to change the bonus of a whip we already have a different whip.
I can do this for dark bow.
I won’t this to work for dragon claws, ags[/quote]

Why don’t you just pick a random ring and add the stats to it? Yes you could do that, but I don’t know why you would when you can just use a ring or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Chane bonuses?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You can’t do this in your Item Configuration file unless you program it to do so (terrible idea). I don’t know why you’d want to do this, but you could add an exception under your wear item for the ID and Rights I guess.

Read full topic
